_source.short_desc: COVID19 ready with contactless ticketing, live streaming, and unique ASD system (Automatic Social Distancing) for assigned seating.
_source.long_desc:
Be prepared for COVID19 with our contactless ticketing, live streaming, and our unique ASD (Automatic Social Distancing) system for assigned seating events.  Guests will be able to easily and safely make online or mobile purchases. You will be able to scan or admit guests when they arrive without ever touching a thing, and for assigned seating, guests will be automatically socially distanced.



Purplepass is the only safe way host events in a COVID19 world.
_source.target_audience: Concerts, fairs, festivals, performing art centers, colleges, high schools, conferences, and conventions

related_products.short_desc: Automate your appointments, cancellations, and reminders by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: From prospective student interviews to campus tours to advising meetings, Acuity works 24/7 behind the scenes to intelligently organize & manage your busy schedule. From the moment a student or prospective student schedules with you, Acuity is there to automatically send customized appointment confirmations, deliver text reminders so students show up on time, and reschedule based on your availability. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly even as admissions season picks up!

related_products.short_desc: Alma's mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.
related_products.features:
Alma's future-proof student information system tools optimize K-12 school operations, empowering educators to improve family engagement and student outcomes. From daily processes to community-wide communication and state reporting, Alma's solutions enhance educational best practices. Our mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.

Empower progress. Spark potential.

related_products.short_desc: Kira Talent is the world's only holistic admissions solution designed for higher education.
related_products.features: Join 300+ schools around the world who partner with Kira Talent to combine on-demand timed video and timed written with the rest of their admissions process. With an average rating of 4.5/5 by our clients, see why Kira Talent is the #1 choice for colleges and universities.

related_products.short_desc: School Management Software providing fully integrated Prospects & Admissions + Marketing Technology to Private Schools
related_products.features: MSP doesn't stop at just being a leading SIS Provider for PK-12 Private Schools. We understand that your school has established specific Admission requirements. This is why we designed the Prospects & Admissions modules in MSP to be flexible enough to work with your schools current Admissions processes. This module is designed exclusively for your Admissions department and enables you to track every student and their current status in real time.

related_products.short_desc: The PeerPal from Graduway tool is an ambassador management tool to connect prospects with community members for authentic marketing.
related_products.features:
PeerPal from Graduway helps admission departments create personalized and authentic admission experiences for prospects virtually in a pandemic world!

The PeerPal from Graduway tool is a chat widget that sits on your website along with an ambassador management system to connect prospects with community members to answer prospects' questions at scale.  You can think of it as a campus tour with authentic reviews opportunity from happy community members in a remote reality!

related_products.short_desc: ThankView is focused on building lasting relationships through personalized video on behalf of those who make the world a better place.
related_products.features: ThankView is focused on building lasting relationships through personalized video on behalf of those who make the world a better place. We're used by 1,000+ universities, nonprofits and health centers that seek to increase their engagement, learn more about their recipients through in-depth metrics and increase the overall financial impact of their outreach efforts. Whether you want to create sincere solicitations, spice up event invites or more individually thank donors, the ThankView platform

related_products.short_desc: Admissions Software that automates the admission process + communication, with third-party integration and detailed reports.
related_products.features: Drive more enrolments with LeadSquared's Admissions Software. Automate your admission process and capture leads from ads, forms, social media, calls, and more. Always stay in touch with email drip campaigns and marketing communication automation to contact parents more quicker. Manage enrolments across platforms, keep track of program performance, and collect detailed reports on student profiles. Seamlessly integrates with all your favorite apps.

related_products.short_desc: Engage, Assess and Admit Students Remotely.
related_products.features: Find your Best-fit Students with Video Admissions Software

related_products.short_desc: Showcase your school's best side with an intelligent admissions platform by ToucanTech.
related_products.features: School marketing & enrolment officers can reduce admin & gain confidence in managing admissions processes using ToucanTech's all-in-one software. Choose a public website or private portal, combined with a powerful database, email engine & events management system. Manage all admission processes in one place, helping to save time, increase efficiency & boost engagement.

related_products.short_desc: Classe365 is a modern student management software with SIS, LMS & CRM features for running schools, colleges, universities & academies
related_products.features: Classe365 is a unified student management software with a comprehensive Student Information System, Learning Management System & Customer Relationship Management features. It is a one-stop solution for running all kinds of educational institutions: schools, colleges, universities & academies. The LMS feature enables institutions to offer online learning in just 2 steps. The SIS feature makes course management, attendance, grading & assessment easier. CRM helps in increasing student enrolment.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails. Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster.
related_products.features:
Eliminate the monotony of back-and-forth emails and inefficient systems when gathering client information. Get hours back each week as FIleInvite handles the most time-consuming work for you.

Gather all the documents, signatures, and data you require up to 80% faster. Set a due date and send an Invite. Your clients receive an email with a link to their own secure client portal, they're then guided through an intuitive portal experience where they can action your requests.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 student-to-student marketing solution for student admissions, purpose-built for higher education.
similar_products.features:
Unibuddy is the #1 student-to-student marketing solution that helps recruiters build authentic connections and empowers prospective students to feel confident in their school choice.

It is quick and easy to set-up, simple to use for everyone, it seamlessly integrates with your CRM, and offers training and support for your team.

Join 500+ institutions that use Unibuddy and have successfully scaled their admissions efforts.

similar_products.short_desc: Integrated web-based tuition management, admission, enrollment, financial aid, and school management for private and public schools.
similar_products.features: Ravenna is a modern, innovative, and highly configurable admission and enrollment CRM designed to ensure schools can expediently track prospects, monitor enrollment, and more. Our solution's users see a gain of 10-25% more applications in their first year by simplifying the often-complex admission process for families and allowing applicants to explore more schools in their region.

similar_products.short_desc: The PeerPal from Graduway tool is an ambassador management tool to connect prospects with community members for authentic marketing.
similar_products.features:
PeerPal from Graduway helps admission departments create personalized and authentic admission experiences for prospects virtually in a pandemic world!

The PeerPal from Graduway tool is a chat widget that sits on your website along with an ambassador management system to connect prospects with community members to answer prospects' questions at scale.  You can think of it as a campus tour with authentic reviews opportunity from happy community members in a remote reality!

similar_products.short_desc: Provide admission candidates with a single login experience to apply, track application status, and make enrollment decisions.
similar_products.features: Make a strong first impression with Blackbaud Enrollment Management System by providing admission candidates with a single login experience to apply, self-schedule tours and interviews, track application status, make enrollment decisions, and submit contracts. Admission teams can customize the application process and quickly identify where candidates are in the funnel, collaborate with online committee review, and run comprehensive reports.

similar_products.short_desc: Online admission management solution that provides application management, review capabilities, and customization options.
similar_products.features: Embark Campus provides online applications and advanced, end-to-end admissions software. In reflecting on our twenty years of client experience, we've developed a new platform that uses the latest technologies to provide a powerful, intuitive admissions experience.  Embark offers superior scalability, performance and customization. With Embark Campus, users can manage every stage of the application process to attract and enroll their ideal incoming class.

similar_products.short_desc: AdmissionsPlus is the all-in-one web-based admissions and enrollment solution for PK-12 public, private and charter schools.
similar_products.features: Easily track and communicate with each applicant step by step through the admissions process, from initial inquiry through acceptance and enrollment.  AdmissionsPlus stores and presents data on your prospective students in an organized and intuitive format.  Quickly and easily view prospect's admission status, school and program applied for, application, portfolio items and more!  Request a demo to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: The affordable cloud-based management system that simplifies your school administrative operations
similar_products.features:
DreamClass is a cloud-based School Management System that eases the load of your administrative tasks and speeds up your daily routines. Keep up with your student admissions, monitor academic progress, manage payments and invoices, and much more, all in a blink of an eye with a super-easy user interface.

From traditional K12 schools to colleges, from dance studios to sport academies, DreamClass will relieve your administrative burden and allow you to focus on what is important, your students!

similar_products.short_desc: Admissions marketing and enrollment CRM that connects students with colleges through personalized engagement and predictive analytics.
similar_products.features: Element451 helps college admissions teams identify, recruit, and convert more prospects into students. Machine learning lets you effectively reach your audiences with personalized messaging and imagery. Automation of tasks and communications lets you spend more time doing what you do best. And our friendly client-success team will make sure you always get support when you need it.

similar_products.short_desc: Texting platform built exclusively for higher ed helping schools build meaningful relationships with students while saving staff time.
similar_products.features:
Build meaningful, personalized connections with students, parents & alumni with Cadence - higher ed's premier texting platform. 

Trusted by over 725 schools to break through the noise and reach students where they are. Cadence includes time-saving features like campaigns, auto-responses, segmentation & more to deliver easy-to-manage, personalized texts to students at mass scale. 

Cadence seamlessly integrates with the tools your school already uses - no installation required.

similar_products.short_desc: DegreeSight helps non-traditional transfer students find out how their credits will transfer and how long it should take to graduate.
similar_products.features:
DegreeSight is a cloud enrollment marketing and success ecosystem that helps institutions answer the questions of, "will my credits transfer?", "how long will they apply?", and "how long will it take me to graduate?"

For universities, this helps you attract more transfer students, increase retention by 10%, and graduate your students on time. For students, this helps you make informed decisions

similar_products.short_desc: Streamline your admissions process and achieve your enrollment goals. Reduce repetitive tasks for your employees and remove friction.
similar_products.features: Cloud-based Admissions Software. An admission software that is well integrated into your SIS functionality allows you to quickly enroll applicants to the course or subject of their choice. Classter end-to-end functionality decreases dramatically the time spent on transferring students from one system to the other while improving data security and eliminating human errors. Experience new levels of efficiency for your teams and improve your end user's satisfaction.

similar_products.short_desc: Collect, manage and analyse admissions all in the same place. Grow your impact and save time on admin.
similar_products.features:
Zealous is an industry-leading admissions software platform designed to streamline the workflow of managers, judges and candidates.

Automate your project with a single time-saving platform accessible from mobile, desktop and tablet.

Customisable projects allow candidates to upload images, text, videos, documents, 3D models and much more. 

Automated emails are sent to candidates and judges.

Zealous users can access a risk-free trial allowing you to gather your first submissions for free.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Higher Education software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Higher Education tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Higher Education software helps universities and higher learning institutions with student recruitment, admissions, faculty and course management, and financial aid. Often higher education software include tools like a student information system, faculty accreditation reporting, eLearning and LMS options, alumni engagement, and document management. Learning institutions looking for higher education software may also be interested in Classroom Management software, Gradebook software, School Administration software, School Accounting software, Grant Management software, Scholarship Management software, and Admissions software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Scholarship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Scholarship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Scholarship Management solutions help educational organizations with collecting and processing applications for financial assistance, as well as administering scholarship distribution.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most Affordable Event Management Software Report

related_products.short_desc: Eventbrite provides cost-effective, innovative ticketing software to help businesses set up, manage, and sell out events online.
related_products.features: Eventbrite provides cost-effective ticketing software to help businesses manage, promote, and sell tickets to events online-while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From backyard barbecues to classes to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. As one of today's fastest-growing ticketing platforms, Eventbrite delivers innovative technology and low fees-and if your event is free, so is Eventbrite. Learn more.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful online ticketing and booking solutions for tour, activity, attraction, and event businesses of all sizes.
related_products.features: FareHarbor provides industry-leading online ticketing and booking solutions for tours, activities, attractions, and events. Through one intuitive Dashboard, FareHarbor eases operations for 16,000+ businesses worldwide. Options like custom seat maps, online seat selection, and automatic assignments can all be tailored to your unique needs while capacity limits and contactless ticket scanning help you maintain the latest safety protocols. All of this alongside our best-in-class, 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Xola builds modern, easy-to-use, booking & marketing software for tour and activity businesses that will save you time & help you grow.
related_products.features: Xola is the only unified booking, sales, and marketing platform for tour and activity businesses. Manage bookings anywhere with real-time availability. Sell through the world's largest marketplaces in a few clicks. Increase online revenue with our powerful abandoned booking remarketing features and track your marketing success in Google Analytics. CC rates as low as 1.99% + 30 cents.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc:
You dream it. We'll ticket it.

Ticket Tailor is an easy to use ticketing platform that puts you in control of your event ticketing.
related_products.features:
Sell tickets direct to your attendees with a simple to use and feature-rich ticketing platform.

- Flexible plans with no contracts
- Low fees (save thousands)
- Get paid directly via Stripe or PayPal
- Fully customise your box office
- Embed booking forms in to your website
- Collect, keep and own your attendee data
- Free check-in app
- Seating charts
- Integrate with your favourite tools
- Discount codes and voucher codes
- Dashboard reporting
- Exceptional customer support

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including ticket sales, seating management, contact management, donation tracking and more.
related_products.features: Create any kind of custom ticket including sponsorship's.  Tickets can have included items with custom designed choices (ex. meal choice, t-shirt size, etc.).  Set ticket start and ending dates, limited ticket sales, promo codes and more.  Purchasers can specify their guests names and email addresses and after purchasing their tickets they can manage tickets they have purchased, change guest names, etc.   Credit cards are automatically stored securely on file for the guest to use at your event.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Eventzilla is a leading cloud-based event registration & marketing platform with thousands of users worldwide. We make it easy for event organizers to create a beautiful, professional web presence to promote their events.

Works perfect for conferences, fundraisers, classes, reunions, concerts, & sports events.

Eventzilla has everything you need to setup a custom event website, publish event schedule, process payments, manage attendee details and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: Free, professional-level online ticket sales system that's incredibly easy-to-use and affordable to all.
related_products.features:
TicketSource is a free, professional-level online ticket sales system that's incredibly easy-to-use and affordable to all. Promote, sell and manage any event in any venue.

We've been in your shoes, experienced the same ticketing challenges and scaled the same ticketing peaks, so we've designed our ticketing system to be simple, cost-and-drama-free, basically, we get it.

related_products.short_desc: To create the most compelling event platform which powers organizations looking to scale using modern technology tools.
related_products.features: Showpass is a global leader in event technology, primary ticketing and distribution, and the mixed delivery (live, virtual and streamed) of experiences for tens of thousands of event hosts. Showpass provides access to global distribution and discovery channels including Facebook's native ticketing, Google Reserve, and a proprietary publishers network. Showpass creates solutions for complex events, large organizations, and high-volume event producers and is proud to serve millions of customers.

related_products.short_desc: RSVPify is a leading online ticketing platform that helps streamline events from guest registration through check-in.
related_products.features: A leading online ticketing and event management platform trusted by 30% of the Fortune 500. Manage events big and small with ease and keep the spotlight on your brand. Powerful features including email invitations, online registration and RSVP, custom data collection, guest list management, menu preferences, sub-event management, event privacy/exclusivity, drag-and-drop seating charts, check-in, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Reserved seating or general admission, our robust platform means venues learn one easy system to manage ticketing and patron data.
related_products.features: Catering to the performing arts for in-person and virtual events. ThunderTix is easy-to-use and easy-to-train staff and volunteers! One system for reserved seating, general admission, fundraising, gift cards, subscriptions, merchandise, customer loyalty, coupons, patron data, and thermal ticket printing. Starting as low as $1 per ticket with nightly payouts. Free tickets are free! Experience stellar customer service with a free trial and learn why ThunderTix is the #1 choice for ticketing.

similar_products.short_desc: Reserved seating or general admission, our robust platform means venues learn one easy system to manage ticketing and patron data.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based platform that helps manage client memberships, ticketing, visitor admission, and fundraising campaigns.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Altru is a cloud-based all-in-one cultural organization management solution that includes tools to manage ticketing for events and programs, cultivate a membership and donor database, run a point of sale system in person and online, and more. Designed specifically for art and historical museums, zoos, aquariums, gardens, and science centers, Blackbaud Altru provides a 360-degree view of your visitors, members, and donors.

similar_products.short_desc: Your Affordable, All-in-One Event Platform. Instant payouts, 24/7 live support. For only $1 per ticket plus 1% of the ticket sale.
similar_products.features: Whether you're hosting a conference, festival, sporting event, concert, or gala, Accelevents has the perfect solution for your event needs. Our all-in-one event platform offers instant payouts, 24/7 live support (for free), conference agenda management, assigned seating, and a host of fundraising tools. All for just $1 per ticket plus 1% of the ticket price (all fees can be absorbed by your ticket buyers).

similar_products.short_desc: Successful events start with Tix. Email marketing, social distancing, donations and more. Low cost and risk free. Get started today!
similar_products.features:
Successful events start with Tix.  Feature-rich ticketing including integrated e-mail marketing tools, social distancing seat maps, timed admissions, donations, up-selling, season ticket renewals, custom branding, web site integration and more.  All risk free with no term commitment and low fees.
Contact us for a Free Demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Ticketsauce is a white label event ticketing & marketing solution that fits every use case and is customizable to fit your every need.
similar_products.features:
Ticketing platforms are either antiquated, expensive, lack customer support, or all of the above.

Ticketsauce and NIGHTOUT came together because we see the whitespace that no other company is addressing; A fully integrated event ticketing and marketing solution that is fundamentally based on the success of our clients.

We've created a one-of-a-kind platform to shake up the event industry and deliver on customer needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful online ticketing and booking solutions for tour, activity, attraction, and event businesses of all sizes.

Options like custom seat maps, online seat selection, and automatic assignments can all be tailored to your unique needs while capacity limits and contactless ticket scanning help you maintain the latest safety protocols. All of this alongside our best-in-class, 24/7 support.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch your event in minutes! We are an all-in-one ticketing solution that provides you and your attendees a unified experience!
similar_products.features: Launch your event in minutes! We are an all-in-one ticketing solution that provides you and your attendees a unified experience! We offer seamless ticketing that is custom with emails, reports, analytics, event pages, and more. Also an Online Experience with chat, one-on-one chat, host moderation, notes, and everything you need to engage your attendees. Join the 30,000+ events that use Brushfire every year! Plus a team you can actually talk to! (866) 825-8252

similar_products.short_desc: Clubspeed's innovative online booking offers a quick, easy way for your customers to reserve activities or events from any device.
similar_products.features: Clubspeed's innovative online booking ticketing system offers a quick, easy way for your customers to reserve activities or events from any mobile device. Our system is a simple, yet extremely powerful and easy-to-use system for every member of your team. Clubspeed uses Smart Learning AI to schedule and reduce overhead while increasing the overall power of your system. Regardless of your specific needs, the world's most trusted family entertainment platform is here to help you succeed!

similar_products.short_desc: The leading ticketing & guest experience solution, backed by 33 years of servicing the world's top attractions.
similar_products.features: For 33 years, Gateway's flagship Galaxy Ticketing & Guest Experience software has been the leading global solution for visitor attractions that need the tools to manage every facet of their operations, including: ticketing online, onsite and at kiosks, timed and capacity managed ticketing, admission control, group sales, retail, food and beverage, membership/pass/donor management, plus reporting and CRM.

similar_products.short_desc: KORONA ticketing POS has no contracts or hidden fees. All training and support is included with a subscription. Try it for free.
similar_products.features:
KORONA ticketing POS system is a complete solution for water parks, amusement parks, museums, concerts, and festivals. KORONA's software is built for all verticals and keeps sales consolidated among ticket booths, eCommerce, kiosks, QSRs, and gift shops.

KORONA ticketing integrates with powerful scanners, ticket printers, self-checkout kiosks, and robust turnstiles keeping lines moving quickly. It also comes with CRM, memberships, loyalty, and group rate options.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell tickets online and host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice.
similar_products.features:
Host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice. 

TicketSpice is an easy-to-use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable ticketing platform. At just $0.99 per ticket, you'll save thousands, while offering a seamlessly simple ticketing experience. 

TicketSpice is flexible and feature-rich, offering full branding control, timed ticketing, reserved seating, mobile scanning, box office, merchandise options, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your event's ticketing with Zoho Backstage-no commission ticket sales, flexible payment methods, and instant payouts guaranteed.
similar_products.features: With Zoho Backstage, you take complete control of your event's ticketing and get to keep all the profits. Plus, flexible payment options (cash, cheque, or digital payments), a 0% commission rate, and more than 10 payment gateways. We also help you in all aspects of your event ticketing-from charging tax and addressing refunds to setting up promo codes and managing guest lists.
